summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 HYUNDAI GENESIS. UPON STARTING THE VEHICLE, THE EMERGENCY BRAKE INDICATOR FLASHED, ALERTING THE DRIVER TO CONTACT THE DEALER. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO DICK SMITH HYUNDAI (825 CONGAREE RD, GREENVILLE, SC 29607) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THERE WAS A BRAKE FLUID LEAKAGE THAT CAUSED CORROSION AND BRAKE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 49,000.
